====Readings====
{{ja-readings|goon=[[そく]] (soku)|kanon=[[しょく]] (shoku)|kun=[[たば]] (taba), [[たばねる]] ([[束ねる]], tabaneru), [[つか]] (tsuka), [[つかねる]] ([[束ねる]], tsukaneru)}}

====Compounds====
* {{ja-r|結束|けっそく}}:  union, unity
* {{ja-r|拘束|こうそく}}:  restriction, restraint
* {{ja-r|装束|しょうぞく}}:  costume, attire
* {{ja-r|束帯|そくたい}}:  old ceremonial court dress
* {{ja-r|束に立つ|そく に たつ}}
* {{ja-r|束縛|そくばく}}:  restraint, shackles
* {{ja-r|束髪|そくはつ}}: bundling one's hair, or the hair so bundled; a [[pompadour]]-like traditional Japanese hairstyle for women
* {{ja-r|電束|でんそく}}: [[electric flux]]
* {{ja-r|波束|はそく}}: [[wave packet]]
* {{ja-r|約束|やくそく}}:  arrangement, convention
